question: Which of the following assisted Saiyyad brothers in dethroning Farrukh Siyar from Delhi?
explanation: Balaji Vishwanath Bhatt assisted Saiyyad brothers in dethroning Farrukh Siyar from Delhi. Balaji Vishwanath Bhatt ruled from c.1713 to 1719 CE. The Chapekar brothers and Nana Sahib both belonged to this family.
